DOC.detailed_description: Although obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) associate impaired glucose tolerance diabetes , remain unclear whether OSA treatment continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) metabolic benefit . To determine effect 8-hour nightly CPAP treatment glucose metabolism individual prediabetes OSA . In randomized , control parallel group study , 39 participant randomize ( 2:1 ) receive either 8-hour nightly CPAP ( n=26 ) oral placebo ( n=13 ) . Sleep polysomnographically record laboratory night . CPAP adherence ensure continuous supervision . Participants continue daily daytime routine activity outside laboratory . Glucose metabolism assess baseline 2-weeks assign treatment use oral intravenous glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ivGTT , respectively ) . The primary outcome overall glucose response quantify area curve glucose 2-hour oral glucose tolerance testing .
